mapper.insert: insert into symptom( person_id, unique_id, unique_id_lv3, p900, patient_id, visit_id, test_finding, lung_cancer_name, heart_failure, symptoms, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{personId}, #{uniqueId}, #{uniqueIdLv3}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{testFinding}, #{lungCancerName}, #{heartFailure}, #{symptoms}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update symptom set person_id = #{personId}, unique_id = #{uniqueId}, unique_id_lv3 = #{uniqueIdLv3}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, test_finding = #{testFinding}, lung_cancer_name = #{lungCancerName}, heart_failure = #{heartFailure}, symptoms = #{symptoms}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
